item.title: Urban Wildlife Alliance
item.description: This project involved configuring a webserver and a publishing platform to be used for a graduate school project. Technologies used: Debian Google Firebase Google Domains Hugo Bash scripting Let’s Encrypt Nginx Rsync Urban Wildlife Alliance website I was requested to help assemble a website that could be used to publish posts about urban wildlife and our coexistence with it. It needed to be easily securable and also provide an easy method for publishing.
